data.text:
Mihono Bourbon leads with four horse lengths! 
Surely she will win this race!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Mihono Bourbon leads with four horse lengths! 
<story>Surely she will win this race!

data.text:
Mihono Bourbon is still ahead! She held on for 2400m 
and finishes first! Six races and all six won! 
She's undefeated now one more crown to go!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Mihono Bourbon is still ahead! She held on for 2400m 
<story>and finishes first! Six races and all six won! 
<story>She's undefeated now one more crown to go!

data.text:
Rice Shower finished 2nd in the Nippon Derby. 
Despite failing to defeat Mihono Bourbon, she made 
incredible progress in the run-up to the race
data.processed:
<story>Rice Shower finished 2nd in the Nippon Derby. 
<story>Despite failing to defeat Mihono Bourbon, she made 
<story>incredible progress in the run-up to the race

data.text:
A few days after the race, I find myself 
at a certain theme park in Chiba prefecture...
data.processed:
<story>A few days after the race, I find myself 
<story>at a certain theme park in Chiba prefecture...

data.text: Whoa! This must be that well-known theme park! With the princess who lives in the castle, and the Big Lightning Mountain!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: Whoa! This must be that well-known theme park! With the princess who lives in the castle, and the Big Lightning Mountain!

data.text:
I wanted to take her to the theme park she'd been wanting 
to go to, as a reward for her hard work. Although...
data.processed:
<story>I wanted to take her to the theme park she'd been wanting 
<story>to go to, as a reward for her hard work. Although...

data.text:
Wow, it's a lot less busy than I expected. 
Hehe, we're lucky today!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Wow, it's a lot less busy than I expected. 
<story>Hehe, we're lucky today!

data.text: Um, Trainer... She really believes we're at that theme park...
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: Um, Trainer... She really believes we're at that theme park...

data.text:
Whilst looking at the extatic Rice Shower, 
Mejiro McQueen whispers into my ear.
data.processed:
<story>Whilst looking at the extatic Rice Shower, 
<story>Mejiro McQueen whispers into my ear.

data.text:
I know you are tight on money this month, 
but really? A different park?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I know you are tight on money this month, 
<story>but really? A different park?

data.text: I, well...
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I, well...

data.text: I, well...
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I, well...

data.text:
Come on, McQueen! Word is that there's a secret 
underground attraction. We gotta check if it's real!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Come on, McQueen! Word is that there's a secret 
<story>underground attraction. We gotta check if it's real!

data.text: Hold on! That's the employee entrance, you doofus!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Hold on! That's the employee entrance, you doofus!

data.text: Come, Trainer! Let's go!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Come, Trainer! Let's go!

data.text: Ah, yes...
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Ah, yes...

data.text:
And so, several hours passed in the blink of an eye 
at the fun (?) theme park.
data.processed:
<story>And so, several hours passed in the blink of an eye 
<story>at the fun (?) theme park.

data.text:
We managed to ride on pretty much every attraction! 
I'm glad there were so few people here today.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>We managed to ride on pretty much every attraction! 
<story>I'm glad there were so few people here today.

data.text:
Seeing her so happy in her ignorance... 
I feel so guilty.
data.processed:
<story>Seeing her so happy in her ignorance... 
<story>I feel so guilty.

data.text: Um... Trainer...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Um... Trainer...

data.text:
I still wanted to ride in the ferris wheel... 
Would you... join me?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I still wanted to ride in the ferris wheel... 
<story>Would you... join me?

data.text:
...So guilty, I might throw up! 
Of course, I can't decline her request 
if it makes her happy.
data.processed:
<story>...So guilty, I might throw up! 
<story>Of course, I can't decline her request 
<story>if it makes her happy.

data.text: Ehehe... Hooray!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ehehe... Hooray!

data.text:
As our little gondola rises further, more and more of our 
field of view gets taken up by the cityscape, 
clad orange by the setting sun.
data.processed:
<story>As our little gondola rises further, more and more of our 
<story>field of view gets taken up by the cityscape, 
<story>clad orange by the setting sun.

data.text: But... Rice Shower has been acting fiddly the entire time.
data.processed: <story>But... Rice Shower has been acting fiddly the entire time.

data.text: Ah... Yes. I just...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ah... Yes. I just...

data.text:
I just can't thank you enough, Trainer... 
I never thought I could make it this far...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I just can't thank you enough, Trainer... 
<story>I never thought I could make it this far...

data.text:
Second place at the derby... 
I never ever imagined it.
data.name: Rice Shower

choices.text: It's because you worked so hard.
It's because you worked so hard.

data.processed:
<story>Second place at the derby... 
<story>I never ever imagined it.

data.text: Eheheh...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Eheheh...

data.text:
But, even though I'm happy to even get second place... 
I really want to get first...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>But, even though I'm happy to even get second place... 
<story>I really want to get first...

data.text: I... I want to defeat Mihono Bourbon.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>I... I want to defeat Mihono Bourbon.

data.text: She wants to win.
data.processed: <story>She wants to win.

data.text:
Getting closer and closer to the undefeated Bourbon 
has further grown her desire to win...
data.processed:
<story>Getting closer and closer to the undefeated Bourbon 
<story>has further grown her desire to win...

data.text:
I just wanted to thank you... It's because of you 
that I now have a desire to win...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I just wanted to thank you... It's because of you 
<story>that I now have a desire to win...

data.text: Ahh...! Now that I've said it, I'm a bit embarrassed...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ahh...! Now that I've said it, I'm a bit embarrassed...

data.text:
I'm glad you've found your confidence. 
Let's beat Bourbon together next time. Together.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I'm glad you've found your confidence. 
<story>Let's beat Bourbon together next time. Together.

data.text:
I'm glad you've found your confidence. 
Let's beat Bourbon together next time. Together.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I'm glad you've found your confidence. 
<story>Let's beat Bourbon together next time. Together.

data.text:
Together... 
Yes! We will do this together!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Together... 
<story>Yes! We will do this together!

data.text:
Whoo, what a day that was! 
And you, Rice. Had fun today?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Whoo, what a day that was! 
<story>And you, Rice. Had fun today?

data.text: Absolutely. This place felt like a utopia, even!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Absolutely. This place felt like a utopia, even!

data.text:
Thank you for my reward, Trainer! 
I'll work just as hard next time!
data.name: Rice Shower

choices.text: And I'll make you work even harder!
And I'll make you work even harder!

data.processed:
<story>Thank you for my reward, Trainer! 
<story>I'll work just as hard next time!

data.text:
One needs only look at Rice's smile to see 
today was a splendid success.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>One needs only look at Rice's smile to see 
<story>today was a splendid success.

data.text: But next time, you shall take her to a real reward, no?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: But next time, you shall take her to a real reward, no?

data.text: O-Okay....
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>O-Okay....

data.text:
The next day, and Rice Shower is back to 
training towards the goal she decided on.
data.processed:
<story>The next day, and Rice Shower is back to 
<story>training towards the goal she decided on.

data.text: *huff* *huff*
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>*huff* *huff*

data.text: Follow... follow...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Follow... follow...

data.text: Lookie there! She's hot on her heels!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Lookie there! She's hot on her heels!

data.text:
Rice is keeping up, no matter how much 
McQueen increases her pace.
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed:
<story>Rice is keeping up, no matter how much 
<story>McQueen increases her pace.

data.text:
Once you set your mind to something, it becomes easier 
to give it your all. Be it studying or running.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Once you set your mind to something, it becomes easier 
<story>to give it your all. Be it studying or running.

data.text:
Once you set your mind to something, it becomes easier 
to give it your all. Be it studying or running.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Once you set your mind to something, it becomes easier 
<story>to give it your all. Be it studying or running.

data.text: Rice is a great example of that.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Rice is a great example of that.

data.text: Rice is a great example of that.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Rice is a great example of that.

data.text: So what's Rice's goal then? McQueen? Or Mihono Bourbon even?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: So what's Rice's goal then? McQueen? Or Mihono Bourbon even?

data.text:
Both, and beyond. She will pursue everything 
to her fullest as long as she sets her mind to it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Both, and beyond. She will pursue everything 
<story>to her fullest as long as she sets her mind to it.

data.text:
Both, and beyond. She will pursue everything 
to her fullest as long as she sets her mind to it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Both, and beyond. She will pursue everything 
<story>to her fullest as long as she sets her mind to it.

data.text: Hmm... Righto.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Hmm... Righto.

data.text:
With the way she's improving, her next rematch with 
Mihono Bourbon is looking to be an exciting one.
data.processed:
<story>With the way she's improving, her next rematch with 
<story>Mihono Bourbon is looking to be an exciting one.

data.text:
And as a bonus, this is also a great way for Mejiro McQueen 
to practice for the Takarazuka Kinen.
data.processed:
<story>And as a bonus, this is also a great way for Mejiro McQueen 
<story>to practice for the Takarazuka Kinen.

data.text:
And so, Rice Shower was the catalyst that raised 
the spirit of the entire team. 
Until...
data.processed:
<story>And so, Rice Shower was the catalyst that raised 
<story>the spirit of the entire team. 
<story>Until...

data.text: McQueen?!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>McQueen?!

data.text:
Rice Shower's shriek sounded through 
the entire training grounds.
data.processed:
<story>Rice Shower's shriek sounded through 
<story>the entire training grounds.
